results.title: Million Dollar Mermaid
results.brief_description: After overcoming polio, Annette Kellerman achieves fame and creates a scandal when her one-piece bathing suit is considered indecent.

constellations_other.name: Film firsts
constellations_other.description: The early days of cinema were an exciting period of experimentation, with many inventors racing to come up with their own moving-image devices.

constellations_other.name: Ice Queens and Sirens of the sea
constellations_other.description: Sports stars and mythological creatures on-screen.

results.description: After overcoming polio, Annette Kellerman achieves fame and creates a scandal when her one-piece bathing suit is considered indecent.
description_for_label: After overcoming polio, Annette Kellerman achieves fame and creates a scandal when her one-piece bathing suit is considered indecent.

results.title: Midsommar
results.headline_credit: Hungary, Sweden and United States of America, 2019
results.brief_description: Several friends travel to Sweden to study as anthropologists a summer festival that is held every ninety years in the remote hometown of one of them. What begins as a dream vacation in a place where the sun never sets, gradually turns into a dark nightmare as the mysterious inhabitants invite them to participate in their disturbing festive activities.

constellations_other.name: Flower on the wind
constellations_other.description: Explore the use of flowers in the moving image as an aesthetic and metaphor.

results.headline_credit_for_label: Hungary, Sweden and United States of America, 2019
results.description: Several friends travel to Sweden to study as anthropologists a summer festival that is held every ninety years in the remote hometown of one of them. What begins as a dream vacation in a place where the sun never sets, gradually turns into a dark nightmare as the mysterious inhabitants invite them to participate in their disturbing festive activities.

results.title: mid90s
results.creator_credit: Waypoint Entertainment, A24, Scott Rudin Productions, Jonah Hill, Lila Yacoub, Ken Kao, Eli Bush, Scott Rudin, Mikey Alfred, Heidi Bivens and Jahmin Assa
results.brief_description: Stevie is a sweet 13-year-old about to explode. His mom is loving and attentive, but a little too forthcoming about her romantic life. His big brother is a taciturn and violent bully. So Stevie searches his working-class Los Angeles suburb for somewhere to belong. He finds it at the Motor Avenue skate shop.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Waypoint Entertainment, A24, Scott Rudin Productions, Jonah Hill, Lila Yacoub, Ken Kao, Eli Bush, Scott Rudin, Mikey Alfred, Heidi Bivens and Jahmin Assa
results.description: Stevie is a sweet 13-year-old about to explode. His mom is loving and attentive, but a little too forthcoming about her romantic life. results.title: Mickey's Choo-Choo
results.brief_description: Mickey is a railroad engineer with an anthropomorphic locomotive. He feeds the train (coal), then feeds his dog, then makes lunch for himself. Minnie drops by and plays a tune on her fiddle while Mickey dances. After lunch, the train has trouble climbing a hill, and the last car with Minnie aboard detaches and runs away.

constellations_other.name: 9.5mm Pathe-Baby and parents behaving badly
constellations_other.description: A look at the link between the Pathé-Baby system and animation, as well as the relationship between cinematic parents and their children.

results.description: Mickey is a railroad engineer with an anthropomorphic locomotive. He feeds the train (coal), then feeds his dog, then makes lunch for himself. Minnie drops by and plays a tune on her fiddle while Mickey dances. After lunch, the train has trouble climbing a hill, and the last car with Minnie aboard detaches and runs away.

Minnie drops by and plays a tune on her fiddle while Mickey dances. After lunch, the train has trouble climbing a hill, and the last car with Minnie aboard detaches and runs away.

results.title: Metropolis
results.brief_description: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city’s mastermind falls in love with a working class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

constellations_other.name: Little, big worlds
constellations_other.description: Wes Anderson's stop-motion animation film draws on tried-and-true techniques that, despite the rise of computer-generated imagery, still inspire filmmakers and game-makers.

constellations_other.name: Arcades and AI
constellations_other.description: Using the godfather of computing, Alan Turing, as a starting point, this Constellation traces the evolution of AI representation on-screen and the way female androids, robots and holograms have been hyper sexualised.

constellations_other.name: Webwurlds
constellations_other.description: Jess Johnson and Simon Ward's work is inspired by science fiction and fantasy. Johnson's hand-drawn illustrations are heavily detailed with geometric patterns and incorporate anthropomorphic characters amongst architectural environments in immersive other worlds.

constellations_other.name: One of the first auteurs
constellations_other.description: A progenitor of modern film genres such as sci-fi, psychological thriller and serial killer films decades before such terms were coined, Austrian-born director Fritz Lang also enjoyed the occasional on-screen meta-moment.

results.description: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city’s mastermind falls in love with a working class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.
description_for_label: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city’s mastermind falls in love with a working class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

results.title: Metamorphosis of a Butterfly
results.brief_description: Metamorphoses du papillon is a two minute 1904 film directed by French filmmaker Gaston Velle. It features early special effects, elaborate costumes and hypnotic dances that show a caterpillar transforming into a butterfly.

constellations_other.name: Colour and creativity
constellations_other.description: From dying film to Technicolor and beyond, creative applications of colour have been part of cinema since its inception.

results.description: The stages that a caterpillar goes through, from larvae to chrysalis, to become a butterfly.
description_for_label: The stages that a caterpillar goes through, from larvae to chrysalis, to become a butterfly.

results.title: Mental
results.headline_credit: Australia and United States of America, 2012
results.brief_description: A charismatic, crazy hothead transforms a family’s life when she becomes the nanny of five girls.

constellations_other.name: Atari’s Basketball
constellations_other.description: Released in 1979, just in time for the arcade heydays of the early 1980s, Atari’s Basketball was the first basketball game to use a trackball as the input mechanic and a 45-degree angled side view. This set the standard for basketball games that followed.

results.description: A charismatic, crazy hothead transforms a family’s life when she becomes the nanny of five girls.
description_for_label: A charismatic, crazy hothead transforms a family’s life when she becomes the nanny of five girls.

results.title: Memento
results.brief_description: Leonard Shelby is tracking down the man who murdered his wife but he suffers from a rare, untreatable form of short-term memory loss.

constellations_other.name: Time to rewind (The Gardens Between)
constellations_other.description: This constellation explores media works that manipulate time, specifically by utitlising a reverse play structure to tell a story.

constellations_other.name: Perception, time and flickering images
constellations_other.description: Using a peep hole and a loop of rotating still images, mutoscopes control the point of view of the audience while also creating the illusion of depth. Filmmakers have since put optical tricks to work creating surreal scenes.

results.description: Leonard Shelby is tracking down the man who raped and murdered his wife. The difficulty of locating his wife’s killer, however, is compounded by the fact that he suffers from a rare, untreatable form of short-term memory loss. Although he can recall details of life before his accident, Leonard cannot remember what happened fifteen minutes ago, where he’s going, or why.
description_for_label: Leonard Shelby is tracking down the man who raped and murdered his wife. The difficulty of locating his wife’s killer, however, is compounded by the fact that he suffers from a rare, untreatable form of short-term memory loss. Although he can recall details of life before his accident, Leonard cannot remember what happened fifteen minutes ago, where he’s going, or why.

results.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
results.creator_credit: Rhode Island Ave. Productions, Indian Paintbrush, Fox Searchlight Pictures, Alfonso Gomez-Rejon, Dan Fogelman, Jesse Andrews, Gerald Sullivan, Jeremy Dawson, Steven M. Rales and Jennifer Eve
results.brief_description: Greg is coasting through senior year of high school as anonymously as possible, avoiding social interactions like the plague while secretly making spirited, bizarre films with Earl, his only friend. But both his anonymity and friendship threaten to unravel when his mother forces him to befriend a classmate with leukemia.

constellations_other.name: Making home movies
constellations_other.description: Home movies have inspired the form and plots of narrative cinema.

results.title_for_label: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
results.creator_credit_for_label: Rhode Island Ave. Productions, Indian Paintbrush, Fox Searchlight Pictures, Alfonso Gomez-Rejon, Dan Fogelman, Jesse Andrews, Gerald Sullivan, Jeremy Dawson, Steven M. Rales and Jennifer Eve
results.description: Greg is coasting through senior year of high school as anonymously as possible, avoiding social interactions like the plague while secretly making spirited, bizarre films with Earl, his only friend. But both his anonymity and friendship threaten to unravel when his mother forces him to befriend a classmate with leukemia.

results.title: Mawson - Life and Death in Antarctica
results.brief_description: In a bold historical experiment, scientist and adventurer Tim Jarvis retraces Douglas Mawson’s Antarctic expedition of 1912 with the same meagre rations, primitive clothing and equipment to uncover what happened to Mawson physically-and mentally-as a man hanging on the precipice of life and death.
results.description: The Douglas Mawson Antarctic Expedition of 1912 is considered one of the most amazing feats of endurance of all time. Although his two companions perished, Douglas Mawson survived, but how? In a bold historical experiment, scientist and adventurer Tim Jarvis is retracing the gruelling experience, with the same meagre rations, primitive clothing and equipment to uncover what happened to Mawson physically-and mentally-as a man hanging on the precipice of life and death.
description_for_label: The Douglas Mawson Antarctic Expedition of 1912 is considered one of the most amazing feats of endurance of all time. Although his two companions perished, Douglas Mawson survived, but how? In a bold historical experiment, scientist and adventurer Tim Jarvis is retracing the gruelling experience, with the same meagre rations, primitive clothing and equipment to uncover what happened to Mawson physically-and mentally-as a man hanging on the precipice of life and death.
